superheroes.name: Spider-Man
superheroes.power: Spider-like abilities, superhuman strength and agility, web-slinging

superheroes.name: Superman
superheroes.power: Superhuman strength, speed, agility, and senses, flight, heat vision, freezing breath

superheroes.name: Batman
superheroes.power: Peak physical and mental conditioning, martial arts mastery, advanced technology

superheroes.name: Wonder Woman
superheroes.power: Superhuman strength, agility, and durability, flight, lasso of truth, bulletproof bracelets

superheroes.name: Iron Man
superheroes.power: Powered suit of armor providing flight, strength, energy blasts, advanced technology

superheroes.name: Captain America
superheroes.power: Peak human strength, agility, and endurance, indestructible shield

superheroes.name: Thor
superheroes.power: Superhuman strength, durability, and stamina, control over lightning and storms, flight

superheroes.name: Hulk
superheroes.power: Superhuman strength and durability, increased healing factor, gamma radiation manipulation

superheroes.name: Flash
superheroes.power: Superhuman speed, agility, and reflexes, time travel, phasing through objects

superheroes.name: Green Lantern
superheroes.power: Ability to create constructs out of green energy, flight, force fields

superheroes.name: The Flash
superheroes.power: Superhuman speed, agility, and reflexes, time travel, phasing through objects

superheroes.name: Aquaman
superheroes.power: Superhuman strength and durability, telepathic control over marine life, underwater breathing and adaptation

superheroes.name: Green Arrow
superheroes.power: Master archer, expert martial artist, peak human physical condition

superheroes.name: Black Panther
superheroes.power: Enhanced strength, agility, and senses, expert martial artist, access to advanced Wakandan technology

superheroes.name: Doctor Strange
superheroes.power: Mastery of mystic arts, reality manipulation, interdimensional travel
